title: Chat Restricted for being...A POSITIVE PLAYER??

embed.description: r/leagueoflegends: This is a subreddit devoted to League of Legends.

body:
I Wrote about this in a Reddit thread, but it didn't get any traction, so maybe I'll leave it here.

I don't care that much about my ban, but I think it's worth noting how League's chat restriction/report system works in this scenario.

So after a long toxic lifestyle of League for a brief period of time, I decided to log off inevitably. I came back a month later to get a few games feeling refreshed and positive. I remember purposefully being overwhelmingly positive! (why doesn't Riot Games look into my chat from previous games?).

Some context. Game starts off well, I have good chemistry with my support, our Wukong is being cocky because he is fed and yelling at my other teammates. I tell him "Shhhh," and remind him to be a team player, not to shit talk others. He's triggered ofc because he's fed. Darius is feeding and quits, which really get's Wukong mad. Then Wukong and Darius are fighting and I try to intervene). Wukong get's mad at me and convinces other players I'm toxic (HUH??). And yeah, a bunch of debauchery that I can't recall.

Anyway I'm assuming i got restricted because members on my team after Game 1 reported me for calling them out for being toxic players. If Riot member is reading this, I implore you to read the rest of the chat to get the full context!

There is a game 2 chat, where I was bit frustrated and acted toxic, but i left it out because it was after a series of long losses about a month before (I own up to that, but honestly they weren't even bad. I consider myself a pretty friendly person).

Game 1 In-Game

Scary Bush: y r u backing

Scary Bush: didn't u just get items

Scary Bush: lol

Scary Bush: nice job annie!

Scary Bush: shhh

Scary Bush: just play stop fighting

Scary Bush: good job nami

Scary Bush: shhhhh

Scary Bush: put half as much energy shit talking into playing

Scary Bush: darius pls don't troll

Scary Bush: ur not that far behind

Scary Bush: u can do this

Scary Bush: don't let them tilt u

Scary Bush: darius we can do this dw

Scary Bush: ur only 1/4 it's not that bad

Scary Bush: i know man i see them

Scary Bush: dont' troll it doesnt' do anything for u or us

Scary Bush: u can be a better man

Scary Bush: im trying to be nice to him :/ Scary Bush: my jg is toxic lol

Scary Bush: woke up wrong side of the bed

Scary Bush: ur both toxic

Scary Bush: don't waste ur time reportingScary Bush: wukon and darius were acting like children and bickering a lot

Scary Bush: we lost from the first 5 mins lol

Scary Bush: no need to report

Scary Bush: darius is having a tantrum because he lost and wukong is flaming

Scary Bush: classic leeg stuff Scary Bush: yes Scary Bush: the rest of them will agree with me

Scary Bush: u can see it in the tone of ur voice

Scary Bush: it doesn't matter what your score is

Scary Bush: it's about having fun and being a team player Scary Bush: neither wukong nor darius did that today

Scary Bush: i don't report

Scary Bush: i hope people can take my words and learn to be more team players

Scary Bush: well gg guy nice luck on getting this team haha

Scary Bush: gg



Post-Game

Scary Bush: ahh in this elo you gotta accept some games are gonna have immature people right?

Scary Bush: i commend annie and nami for being positive!

Scary Bush: you guys are good



oh here's a pic of Darius' build that game lmao (It's in the reddit link)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Scary Bush,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-06-18T23:28:34.660+0000)
>
> Scary Bush: ur both toxic
> Scary Bush: don't waste ur time reporting
> Scary Bush: wukon and darius were acting like children and bickering a lot
> Scary Bush: we lost from the first 5 mins lol
> Scary Bush: no need to report
> Scary Bush: darius is having a tantrum because he lost and wukong is flaming

That right there is not positive chat.
Not positive? Sure. Should it be bannable? IMO no.

> [{quoted}](name=Zardo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-06-18T23:55:03.187+0000)
>
> Not positive? Sure. Should it be bannable? IMO no.

But Riot punishes for negative chat (according to the wishes of the vast majority of the playerbase), so the ban makes perfect sense.
Riot generally bans for negativity severity * frequency, so unless there is something missing I don't think the low amount of minor negativity shown in these chat logs justify the chat restriction.

> [{quoted}](name=Zardo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=0003000000000001,timestamp=2019-06-19T00:59:52.601+0000)
>
> Riot generally bans for negativity severity * frequency, so unless there is something missing I don't think the low amount of minor negativity shown in these chat logs justify the chat restriction.

The reform card doesn't show every single valid report. It's a selection of one to five games.

Also note that the OP actually said that there was another log that was so abhorrent that even they recognize how poor their behavior was. The one OP deigned to show us is the _good_ one.

Well I wouldn't go so far as to say it was "abhorrent" rather slightly inconsequential to the argument at hand. Like I said, the other chat was pretty toxic as far as I can remember. But it came from a pretty draining few months of League of Legends.

When I came back to play I was really overwhelmingly positive in my previous games, which Riot doesn't take into account for. I feel they only restricted me because I had 2 strikes (one of which ultimately was deserving), with the current being game being labeled as "negative" because of a flawed reporting system.

That's my personal opinion
Given that there is an entire game worth of chat logs referenced but not visible to us any opinion would be based on incomplete information.
Anyway, I mentioned why that was irrelevant in this case, but if I can find it again I will most def share it here!

I really don't think I was being negative, I was giving an honest statement about what happened and explaining why the enemy team shouldn't be reporting players on my own team. Wukong kept asking in all chat for the enemy team to report Darius which rubbed me the wrong way, because Wukong was a catalyst for his poor play!

Call me crazy I guess...
That and this missing Game 2 log
your opinion on what should be bannable and what isn't doesn't mean shit, you aren't the judge here.  riot is.

Well thank you Tim! You're absolutely right, again I'm just trying to voice my opinion I'm not they banned me, I know I'm a positive player and because of the way the system works, I was punished for the wrong reasons.

Ah, I wish you could have more context. I agree though. Could I have just kept my mouth shut, sure. But at the end of the day, Wukong was asking in all chat to report Darius, which I think is really counter-intuitive. So all I was really doing was trying to explain the situation.

Thanks for understanding though.

Ah man, I can see how looks bad taken out of context. Lemme explain, since Riot doesn't give a full chat report. What had happened was Wukong and Darius were constantly arguing. Wukong did well and made sure to let Darius know he wasn't pulling weight (trash talking, flaming etc). So by the end of the game You had Wukong complaining about how Darius did so poorly and asking for report (which i believe is a silly thing to ask for). 

That's where I came in and was trying to moderate, and give the full extent of the story. Really what happened was that Wukong did really well and Darius was tlited from Wukong's constant flaming, so honestly I thought both were to blame at the end of day. I was just telling the other team not to report, and if you look at the post game log you can see that. Darius really just gave up because nobody was encouraging him, I DID THOUGH, if you want to read the chat logs again. 

Man I really wish Riot would include the whole thing, so I don't look like a fool haha, but you know I'm just trying to be honest so take it as you will.
Please attach full screenshots of your reform card so that a discussion can be had about this.

> [{quoted}](name=Scary Bush,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-06-18T23:28:34.660+0000)

I remember purposefully being overwhelmingly positive! (why doesn't Riot Games look into my chat from previous games?).
>

I tell him "Shhhh," and remind him to be a team player, not to shit talk others. He's triggered ofc because he's fed. Darius is feeding and quits, which really get's Wukong mad. Then Wukong and Darius are fighting and I try to intervene). Wukong get's mad at me and convinces other players I'm toxic (HUH??). And yeah, a bunch of debauchery that I can't recall.

>

> Game 1 In-Game

> 
> oh here's a pic of Darius' build that game lmao (It's in the reddit link)

The formatting of your chat logs implies that this was not a direct copy-paste from the client. Could we see a screenshot of your chat logs to exclude suspicions of tampering?

Your game 2 chat is also part of the decision behind the ban so you can't really exclude that and expect a fully informed opinion.

I really wish I still had it, i don't anymore. But like I said it was pretty toxic! I'm not claiming that I wasn't toxic. If there are key words, I'm sure I hadn't said any of them though. 

Again, i didn't leave it in because I figured it was irrelevant. Im just trying to say that the chat log I posted, shouldn't have been factored into the equation of negative attitude!
Nice.
yeah, it's a classic Riot thing, they ban you if you're positive, but if you say the N-word in game WITH PREMADES they don't do anything because premades are the best thing!!!
If your behavior is not reported, it cannot be reviewed and therefore will not be punished. Generally, I'd still say not to use slurs in game.

"not reported...cannot be reviewed" That's what I'm getting at here. I feel I was reported because my teammate Wukong wrongfully goaded the enemy team to report me, and ofc reported me himself. I think Darius might have reported me too, because I was urging him not to troll.

At the end of the day, I don't think those reports were called for and in the overall positive from that game as well as my last two were severely   overlooked in favor of one negative game I had.

> [{quoted}](name=Scary Bush,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=000100010001,timestamp=2019-06-19T06:44:15.465+0000)
>
> "not reported...cannot be reviewed" That's what I'm getting at here. I feel I was reported because my teammate Wukong wrongfully goaded the enemy team to report me, and ofc reported me himself. I think Darius might have reported me too, because I was urging him not to troll.
> 
> At the end of the day, I don't think those reports were called for and in the overall positive from that game as well as my last two were severely   overlooked in favor of one negative game I had.

So... You weren't restricted for being a positive player, you were restricted for the one negative game you had.

You could play 1000 games and only be toxic in one of them, and you're still going to get punished. Riot doesn't take in account your previous games before your toxic games, or the games after your toxic game. The IFS system doesn't take that in account either. The point is you were toxic for one game and you even admitted it, so you got punished for it.

I have over 1,500 hours in this game and got chat restricted for ONE SINGLE GAME I was toxic in due to me having a bad streak and continuing to play rather than stopping for the night, therefore I got my first punishment. Even though all my games before I was the one getting all the "tilt proof" honors, the one who would keep the peace, etc. It doesn't matter. I was toxic, I got punished.

It's good that you are being positive now, but that doesn't erase or outweigh the negative game(s) you've had in the past.

You can still get back to honor level 2 if that's what you're worried about so long as you continue to be positive. Try not to say anything negative, really. At all. Only use the chat for neutral/positive behavior, or to make game calls. That way you know you can't be punished for chat-related behavior.
i don't remember using any slurs! I'm a POC, and understand the weight that these words carry. If I'm wrong I seriously regret that I've ever used any. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Scary Bush,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2019-06-19T05:26:46.102+0000)
>
> i don't remember using any slurs! I'm a POC, and understand the weight that these words carry. If I'm wrong I seriously regret that I've ever used any. :)

That was not in regards to your logs.
copy!

> [{quoted}](name=BrieLarsonMyWife,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-18T23:32:05.099+0000)
>
> yeah, it's a classic Riot thing, they ban you if you're positive, but if you say the N-word in game WITH PREMADES they don't do anything because premades are the best thing!!!

Oh, i thought sarcasm at first, but you actually seem serious lmao
Well, I don't agree with you. I'm a POC and would never use that word, there's quite a bit of history and pain behind it.

Well there's been quite a lot of traction and I finally got an open discussion (well more geared towards a moderate disdain towards me, but alas). 

Anyway I feel some context needs to be established. Once I came back from my Hiatus, I made sure to be overwhelmingly positive. I did, and won the last two games before that! This game, despite my early efforts to encourage a feeding Darius, Wukong managed to get the best of him and tilt him to the point where he started doing some questionable things (like sell all his items, and build AP). 

That's where this comment comes in "put half as much energy shit talking into playing." Could it have been phrased better? Sure, sure, but really i feel like I was expressing a stern disappointment to Wukong's flaming of another teammate, which honestly was reductive. 

So i really want to ask why nobody really has addressed this portion of the chat log:

Scary Bush: nice job annie!

Scary Bush: shhh

Scary Bush: just play stop fighting

Scary Bush: good job nami

Scary Bush: shhhhh

Scary Bush: put half as much energy shit talking into playing

Scary Bush: darius pls don't troll

Scary Bush: ur not that far behind

Scary Bush: u can do this

Scary Bush: don't let them tilt u

Scary Bush: darius we can do this dw

Scary Bush: ur only 1/4 it's not that bad

Scary Bush: i know man i see them

Scary Bush: dont' troll it doesnt' do anything for u or us

Scary Bush: u can be a better man

Scary Bush: im trying to be nice to him :/ Scary Bush: my jg is toxic lol

Honestly I was really trying my best to encourage Darius, but Wukong kept flaming him. That rubbed me the wrong way, so I decided to be a bit more real.

Towards the end of the game, Wukong was asking the enemy team to report our Darius, who admittedly was trolling hard. I really think that was hypocritical of Wukong though, because in my eyes he served as a catalyst to Darius' eventual loss of effort. Wukong constantly flamed Darius and lost sight of playing properly imo.

So when the enemy team asked what was going on, i responded in an honest fashion: "darius is having a tantrum because he lost and wukong is flaming"
I told them that I don't think they should report, I believe asking an enemy team to report his in and of itself toxic and reductive to the game. 

So yeah, I want to have an open discussion if you guys want to, but If you really can't see why I believe this was overall a more positive game than a negative one, that says more about you (to me) than it does about me.

Much Love,
Scary Bush
Haven’t really seen anything worth punishment so imma say this was undeserved
Amazing that you were somehow able to know what was on the game 2 chat log without the OP ever giving them.

Hey man, thanks for the input. Like I said, I'm not shying away from the fact that I was toxic. I really was that game. But i took a break and made sure to be overwhelmingly positive when I came back. 

I played 2 really amazing game and won with that attitude. That carried on into the game in the chat log, but you know, someone does bad, and someone else gets mad. And I was just trying to moderate is all. Wukong was asking for the enemy team to report, but I was explaining why they shouldn't report!

> [{quoted}](name=Soul Dealer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IapEAgpI,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-06-18T23:59:56.179+0000)
>
> Haven’t really seen anything worth punishment so imma say this was undeserved

Did you forget the part where he/she purposely left out the other games referenced in her punishment? Where he/she admitted he/she broke the rules? Or the fact that it was an edited chat log he/she posted? So many reasons to not make a judgement due to lack of information, but yeah lets just say its undeserved anyways.

Thank you for the acknowledgment of my previous game! I do admit I was pretty toxic in that game, though I fail to remember what actually occurred. 

Anyway, I left it out of the post because it was after a hiatus from League of Legends. Once I came back from my break, i made sure I dedicated myself to being wholeheartedly positive. I get that the ban accounts for previous events of toxicity, but I really do believe this was a bit uncalled for given my situation. I know it's hard to judge on such a micro scale, but i'd just like to share my point of view.

I wish Riot would post these games! Because i won both and it felt so refreshing to see how a positive attitude could reflect on a win.

Thanks for understanding man. I feel like a lot of people are out to try their hardest to prove me wrong. 

Hey i get it, it's empowering to show that someone is actually negative when they claim they were positive. But honestly their are so many threads out there that are ridiculous. I feel there is an honest argument to be had here!

You were on thin ice from your other game. Your propensity to get punished does not diminish when you take a break, it carries over. It does’t matter if that 2nd game was yesterday or a year ago, it’s still one of the most recent games you played. And you were toxic in it. Apparently so toxic that you wont even post the chat logs here. Chat restriction deserved.

Actually it wasn't the most recent game I played! I played 2 games before, which were overwhelmingly positive (I wish Riot would include that those logs). But yeah, I totally get what you're saying, which is why I made sure that when I came back to play, I would remain only positive.

And I have been pretty positive so far!

> Scary Bush: u can see it in the tone of ur voice

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
So you leave out a chat log with toxicity, and conclude that you've been banned for being positive? You trollin?
Sorry mate; the IFS is this way to appease the sensitive portion of the playerbase
I feel it is more to enforce a positive community, but I understand your sentiment.
